name: Extreme Forklifting 2
description: Always dreamed of becoming a forklift operator? Now you can!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7/8/10 Processor: Intel Core 2 or similar Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: Video card must have 256 MB or more and be DirectX 9-compatible DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 200 MB available space

reviews.review_text: Perfect for those that smkoe too much weed for a real forklift job.

Awsome forklifting experince heaps better than our crappy fork we have at work. Just keeps on going no need to charge after just one pallet will even go up ramps without a push. If your work place has a crappy fork and you want to try out a better one then this is the game for you. Even Craigo would love to try a fork like this and might even smile about it. If your too old to get a fork job and have a licence like old Brucey boy play this and get the ilusion that you got a real job just without pay.
Awesome game! I hope the Devs keep this game updated with new content.
Still a better game than  No Man's Sky .  Nominated for the Steam Awards 2016 in the category 'Rollstuhlstyle'.

I didn't play this game very much because it got boring very quickly. it seems all you do is drive pallets around to different locations. Maybe next time the developers could add some sort of fun aspect to it. I'm not sure what could be fun about forklifting though.
Loving every extreme forklifting second. Much simulation. Very wow. So forklift.
